product_highlights: Suitable for moisturizers, serums, masks, exfoliators
notes: G-Biotec is a South Korean biotechnology company specializing in probiotic-derived cosmetic actives. Their flagship product Gebiotide® Bifida Ferment Lysate is a premium ingredient derived from Bifida bacteria fermentation, offering moisturizing, anti-aging, and microbiome-balancing benefits. The ingredient is suitable for various applications including moisturizers, serums, facial masks, and exfoliators. Korean expertise in fermentation technology and cosmetic innovation ensures high-quality products that meet international standards. Focus on scientific research and efficacy validation.

G-Biotec produces Gebiotide® Bifida Ferment Lysate, a probiotic-derived ingredient for cosmetic applications. Suitable for moisturizers, serums, masks, and exfoliators. Korean supplier specializing in biotechnology-derived cosmetic actives.
